# cato_app_connector (Resource)

The `cato_app_connector` resource contains the configuration parameters necessary to manage an app connector.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cato_app_connector" "example" {
  name        = "example-app-connector"
  description = "example-app-connector description"
  group_name  = "example-group"
  location = {
    address      = "123 Main St"
    city_name    = "Chicago"
    country_code = "US"
    state_code   = "US-CA"
    timezone     = "America/New_York"
  }
  preferred_pop_location = {
    automatic      = false
    preferred_only = true
    primary        = { name = "New York" }
    secondary      = { name = "Chicago" }
  }
  type = "VIRTUAL"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `group_name` (String) Name of the ZTNA App Connector group
- `location` (Attributes) App connector location (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--location))
- `name` (String) The unique name of the ZTNA App Connector
- `type` (String) Connector type (virtual, physical)

### Optional

- `description` (String) Optional description of the ZTNA App Connector (max 250 characters)
- `preferred_pop_location` (Attributes) Preferred PoP locations settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--preferred_pop_location))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique ID of the ZTNA App Connector
- `private_apps` (Attributes List) List of private applications (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--private_apps))
- `serial_number` (String) Unique serial number of the ZTNA App Connector
- `socket_id` (String) Connector type (virtual, physical)
- `socket_model` (String) Socket model of the ZTNA App Connector

<a id="nestedatt--location"></a>
### Nested Schema for `location`

Required:

- `city_name` (String) City name
- `country_code` (String) Country code
- `timezone` (String) Timezone

Optional:

- `address` (String) Street, number
- `state_code` (String) State code


<a id="nestedatt--preferred_pop_location"></a>
### Nested Schema for `preferred_pop_location`

Required:

- `automatic` (Boolean) Automatic PoP location
- `preferred_only` (Boolean) Restrict connector attachment exclusively to the configured pop locations

Optional:

- `primary` (Attributes) Physical location of the pripary Pop (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--preferred_pop_location--primary))
- `secondary` (Attributes) Physical location of the secondary Pop (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--preferred_pop_location--secondary))

<a id="nestedatt--preferred_pop_location--primary"></a>
### Nested Schema for `preferred_pop_location.primary`

Optional:

- `id` (String) Primary location ID
- `name` (String) Primary location name


<a id="nestedatt--preferred_pop_location--secondary"></a>
### Nested Schema for `preferred_pop_location.secondary`

Optional:

- `id` (String) Secondary location ID
- `name` (String) Secondary location name



<a id="nestedatt--private_apps"></a>
### Nested Schema for `private_apps`

Optional:

- `id` (String) Private app ID
- `name` (String) Private app name
